Name: enforce_team_size_limit
Description: Ensures the team size does not exceed the maximum recommended members.

Name: respect_worker_availability
Description: The sum of effort for tasks assigned to a worker must not exceed their availability.

Name: stay_within_sprint_capacity
Description: The total story points in a sprint backlog must not exceed the team's velocity.

Name: project_must_be_within_budget
Description: The total cost incurred by the project must not exceed its allocated budget.

Name: user_story_requires_criteria
Description: A user story cannot be added to a sprint without defined acceptance criteria.

Name: task_status_must_be_valid
Description: A task's status must be one of the predefined values (e.g.

Name: sprint_has_defined_goal
Description: A sprint cannot start without a clearly defined sprint goal.

Name: feature_requires_priority
Description: A feature must have a priority assigned to be included in the product backlog.

Name: avoid_high_severity_blockers
Description: A sprint cannot be successfully completed if there are active blockers of the highest severity.

Name: sprint_duration_is_fixed
Description: The duration between the start and end date of a sprint must be constant (e.g.

Name: skill_level_must_be_adequate
Description: A worker assigned to a task should have a minimum skill level.

Name: epic_must_be_detailed
Description: An epic must have a description before user stories can be derived from it.
